task: Insert the path or filename in a header or footer
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Header & Footer' section, click on 'Header' or 'Footer', depending on where you want to insert the path or filename.
From the drop-down menu, select the desired header or footer style.
Click on the 'Design' tab that appears after selecting the header or footer.
In the 'Header & Footer' section, click on 'Quick Parts'.
In the 'Field' dialog box, select 'FileName' from the list of field names.
Check the 'Add path to filename' option if you want to include the file path.
Click on the 'OK' button to insert the path or filename in the header or footer.
Save the document to apply the changes.
